[Infection Prevention Priority Period] This class will be conducted as a simultaneous two-way class via Zoom (URL: https://us06web.zoom.us/j/88565083012?pwd=SjkyM3M4cmtWdWE3Vnl2d1czUWdrZz09 ) from April 21 (Session 2) until further notice.
This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will practice verbal communication skills suitable for future business needs. Textbook and written work will provide input and language basis regarding business English as it is used in workplaces. Materials will also be provided for working on short presentation skills suitable for business contexts. Class time will be devoted to pairwork and discussions, along with presentations. Homework and written preparation for discussions and presentations outside of class will be essential. Work with video to record video CVs and practice interview skills will also be done. Classes are currently planned to be taught face-to-face in the classroom; adaptations may be made based on changing conditions and university policies.
(Information only for students who have received permission from university to take classes online): Class sessions will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast. A permanent link to the Zoom session will be updated in the syllabus after student registration and verification of online registrants is done.
